greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Central diagonal of A163334 and A163336.
comment: It is easy to see by induction that these terms are always divisible by 4.
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(v=digits(n,3),s=Mod(0,2)); for(i=1,#v, if(s,v[i]=2-v[i]); s+=v[i]); fromdigits(v,9)<<2; \\ _Kevin Ryde_, Nov 06 2020
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 29 2009
